C

canMove(Worker, Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method checks if a given worker can move For each cell around the worker it checks: - If the cell is free - If the cell is not the same one where the worker is - If the difference between the actual cell level and the next one is at most one - If the cell's level is less than 4 (meaning there is not a dome in that cell) If every test has been passed, a counter is incremented
canMove(Worker, Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GodCardController
This method returns the amount of cells in which the checkCellAround returns true.
card - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GodCard
 
Cell - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
This class defines a cell on the board.

checkBuild(Cell, PlayerBuild) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
It checks if the given building action can be performed.
checkBuilt(Controller, Cell, PlayerBuild) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GodCard
This returns the default controller's check build OVERRIDE this method to change the controls
checkBuilt(Controller, Cell, PlayerBuild) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Hestia
This method modifies the check cell's tests if Hestia built the second time.
checkBuilt(Controller, Cell, PlayerBuild) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Zeus
This method overrides the standard build controls As documented, Zeus can also build in the same cell where the used worker is.
checkCanBuild(Worker, GodCardController) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GodCard
This method checks every cell around the worker are free and with a level lower then a dome If true the cell is added to the available cells list.
checkCantBuild(PlayerBuild) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GodCardController
This method checks whether the worker which has been used to build the first time can build again It's in particular useful with gods that can build two or more times.
checkCell(int, int, Worker, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
Default checker for a move
checkCell(GodCardController, int, int, Worker, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GodCard
This method returns the default controller check cell OVERRIDE this method to change the control
checkCell(GodCardController, int, int, Worker, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Apollo
Modified control for Apollo, check is the selected cell is also full and the two workers switchable
checkCell(GodCardController, int, int, Worker, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Minotaur
Modified controls for Minotaur
checkCell(GodCardController, int, int, Worker, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Prometheus
Modified check cell for Prometheus, set muxUpDifference at one if the player has built
checkCellsAround(Worker) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method is used to determine in which cells the worker can move, associating every cell around the worker to a boolean value This method checks every cell around the worker, then using the checkCell function it associates a cell to the returned boolean The IllegalArgumentException is caught for the perimeter cells
checkCellsAround(Worker) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GodCardController
This method is used to determine in which cells the worker can move, associating every cell around the worker to a boolean value The check is made by a god card function by default, if the god card doesn't have any different implementation the GodCard.checkCell call the controller check cell GodCard
checkVictory() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method checks if any player has won This method uses the function canMove to decide whether a worker is able to move or not If any player's workers can't move, it calls the model's loose method, giving it the player who looses as parameter
checkVictory() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GodCardController
This method checks if any of the win conditions within the cards in the game affects the victory of any player.
checkVictory(Model, GodCardController) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GodCard
This function has to be overridden if a god card has a particular winning condition In particular, it can be used to check if he has won when is not his turn
checkVictory(Model, GodCardController) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Chronus
This method changes the winning conditions.
